channel.title: Matt Johnson on tracker
channel.description: Recent content in Matt Johnson on tracker

item.title: Yellow Dog Plains sulfide mine update
item.description: Marquette, MI – Matt Johnson, director of the Governor’s Office for the Upper Peninsula, has resigned from his post and now works for Rio Tinto, the parent company of Kennecott Minerals. The company has an office in Ishpeming, MI, and is seeking to develop a nickel-copper mine on the Yellow Dog Plains, in addition to other mineral projects in the area.
